text: The DS 3 Crossback is a subcompact luxury crossover SUV from the French automaker DS Automobiles. The vehicle was presented for the first time on 13 September 2018, and its public premiere is at the 88th Paris Motor Show in October 2018. The SUV is the first vehicle based on the PSA EMP1 platform of Groupe PSA. Powertrains include a range of petrol and diesel engines and an electric version. Its predecessor is the smaller DS 3. A fully electric version, known as "E-Tense", is also sold.
